hooks.command: TMUX_TARGET=$(/opt/homebrew/bin/tmux display-message -t $TMUX_PANE -p '#{session_name}:#{window_index}') ; PANE_TTY=$(/opt/homebrew/bin/tmux display-message -t $TMUX_PANE -p '#{pane_tty}') ; DIR_NAME=$(basename "$PWD") ; SCRIPT=$(mktemp /tmp/claude-notify.XXXXXX.sh) ; echo '#!/bin/bash' > $SCRIPT ; echo "/usr/bin/osascript -e 'activate application \"kitty\"'" >> $SCRIPT ; echo "/opt/homebrew/bin/tmux select-window -t $TMUX_TARGET" >> $SCRIPT ; echo "/opt/homebrew/bin/tmux select-pane -t $TMUX_PANE" >> $SCRIPT ; echo "rm $SCRIPT" >> $SCRIPT ; chmod +x $SCRIPT ; /opt/homebrew/bin/terminal-notifier -title "Claude Code ($DIR_NAME)" -message 'Needs your input' -execute $SCRIPT ; printf '\a' > $PANE_TTY
